div.p: Lunch Will be served 11:00 to 12:00 At Coffeeville Elementary. The lunch will be a grab and go lunch. Lunch is only for 18 years and younger. The entrance will be at the play ground drop off.

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-f694843 elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.p: The Coffeeville School District consists of two campuses. The Coffeeville Elementary School campus contains grades PreK-7th, and Coffeeville High School serves grades 8th-12th.

Our district strives to provide a well-rounded academic education as well as a variety of extracurricular opportunities. Both school implement the Positive Behavior Interventions and Supports (PBIS) model to encourage students to maintain good character. We have an energetic, highly qualified faculty and staff who work diligently each day to assure our community produces well-educated students.
We invite you to browse our site and discover what makes being a Pirate so great. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
